00023 class SocketData : public SysSocket
00024 {
00025     typedef SysSocket Base;
00026

00028     friend class UdpSocket;

00036         InetSocket* GetAttachedSocket() const { return m_socket; }
00037         ExecutionContext* GetContext() const { return m_context; }
00038 
00039         BOOLEAN IsInUse() const { return m_socket != 0; }
00040 
00041         DataConnProfileId GetDataConnProfileId() const { return m_daco_id; }
00042         void SetDataConnProfileId(DataConnProfileId id) { m_daco_id = id; }
00043 
00044         SocketError GetError() const { return m_err; }
00045         BOOLEAN SetError(SocketError err) {
00046             m_err = err;
00047             return err == c_socket_no_error;
00048         }
00049 
00050         BOOLEAN SetError(BOOLEAN ok) {
00051             m_err = ok ? c_socket_no_error : GetSysError();
00052             return ok;
00053         }

00057

00076     private:
00077         class SdCond : public BooleanCondition {
00078             typedef BooleanCondition Base;
00079             public:
00080                 SdCond() : m_in_use(FALSE) { }
00081                 void Init() { Base::Init(); m_in_use = TRUE; }
00082                 BOOLEAN IsInUse() const { return m_in_use; }
00083                 void SetUnused() { m_in_use = FALSE; }
00084             private:
00085                 BOOLEAN m_in_use;
00086         };

00105             { return m_active_daco_id != c_invalid_data_conn_profile_id; }
00106 
00107         DataConnProfileId GetActiveDaCoProfileId() const
00108             { return m_active_daco_id; }
00109         void SetActiveDaCoProfileId(DataConnProfileId id)

00113         BOOLEAN WaitForDataRecv();
00114         void UnblockDataRecv();
00115 
00116         void OnDataRecv() {
00117             if (m_recv_cond.IsInUse()) {
00118                 m_recv_cond.SetTrue();
00119             }
00120         }
00121         
00122         BOOLEAN IsWaitingForDataSent() const { return m_send_cond.IsInUse(); }
00123         BOOLEAN WaitForDataSent();
00124         void UnblockDataSend();
00125 
00126         void OnDataSent() {
00127             if (m_send_cond.IsInUse()) {
00128                 m_send_cond.SetTrue();
00129             }
00130         }
